  2. Oh Banana! Donkey Kong Bananza Direct peels back the layers of DK’s transformative new adventure on Nintendo Switch 2 - News - Nintendo Official Site  Nintendo
  3. Donkey Kong Bananza Is Getting an Amiibo, and It's Now Available To Preorder  IGN
  4. Nintendo shows off Donkey Kong Bananza’s destructive gameplay  The Verge
  5. Marathon Gets Delayed, Donkey Kong Bananza Gets A Smashing Showing, And More Top Stories  Kotaku
